subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: About two weeks after a nearly three-hour meeting in Beverly Hills, Calif., the Yankees and Tanaka, a prized pitcher from Japan, agreed to a seven-year, $155 million contract.
snippet: About two weeks after a nearly three-hour meeting in Beverly Hills, Calif., the Yankees and Tanaka, a prized pitcher from Japan, agreed to a seven-year, $155 million contract.
